title: A Rude (Jude) Sexual Awakening
itunes:title: A Rude (Jude) Sexual Awakening
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Emily is joined by radio host of the All Out Show on SiriusXM Shade 45 @onemorejude & they’re talking about communication and making sex better. Plus, Emily is answering your emails. They talk about how dating gets better as...
description:
On today’s show, Emily is joined by radio host of the All Out Show on SiriusXM Shade 45 @onemorejude & they’re talking about communication and making sex better. Plus, Emily is answering your emails.

They talk about how dating gets better as you get older but also how social media plays a big role in it, how to get over an embarrassing sex moment, & ways you and your partner can play around with positions to find the best angles for pleasure. 


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com

For more info on Rude Jude, click HERE. 

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
